breakfast_001.title: Classic Oatmeal with Berries
breakfast_001.instructions: Bring water to boil, add oats and reduce heat. Simmer for 5 minutes stirring occasionally. Top with berries, honey, and cinnamon.

breakfast_002.title: Scrambled Eggs with Toast
breakfast_002.instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Melt butter in pan, add eggs and scramble until cooked. Toast bread and serve together.

lunch_001.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
lunch_001.instructions: Grill chicken breast and slice. Toss greens, tomatoes, and cucumber. Top with chicken and drizzle with oil and vinegar.

lunch_002.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
lunch_002.instructions: Cook quinoa according to package. Roast vegetables at 400F for 20 minutes. Assemble bowl with quinoa, chickpeas, and vegetables. Drizzle with tahini-lemon dressing.

dinner_001.title: Baked Salmon with Vegetables
dinner_001.instructions: Preheat oven to 400F. Season salmon and vegetables with oil and spices. Bake for 15-18 minutes until salmon is cooked through. Serve with lemon.

dinner_002.title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
dinner_002.instructions: Cook rice according to package. Press and cube tofu. Stir-fry tofu until golden, add vegetables and cook until tender. Add soy sauce and sesame oil. Serve over rice.

snack_001.title: Greek Yogurt with Nuts
snack_001.instructions: Place yogurt in bowl, top with nuts and drizzle with honey.

snack_002.title: Apple with Almond Butter
snack_002.instructions: Slice apple and serve with almond butter for dipping.

breakfast_003.title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
breakfast_003.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with salt and pepper. Poach eggs in simmering water for 3-4 minutes. Spread avocado on toast, top with poached egg and tomatoes.

breakfast_004.title: Protein Pancakes
breakfast_004.instructions: Blend eggs, banana, oats, and protein powder. Cook small pancakes on griddle 2-3 minutes per side. Top with berries.

breakfast_005.title: Smoothie Bowl
breakfast_005.instructions: Blend banana, berries, and yogurt until thick. Pour into bowl. Top with granola and chia seeds.

breakfast_006.title: Veggie Omelet
breakfast_006.instructions: Beat eggs. SautÃ vegetables in oil. Pour eggs over vegetables, add cheese. Cook until set, fold in half.

lunch_003.title: Turkey Wrap
lunch_003.instructions: Layer turkey, lettuce, tomato, and avocado on tortilla. Add mustard. Roll tightly and slice in half.

lunch_004.title: Lentil Soup
lunch_004.instructions: SautÃ chopped vegetables. Add lentils and broth. Simmer 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender. Season to taste.

lunch_005.title: Tuna Salad
lunch_005.instructions: Drain tuna. Combine greens, tomatoes, cucumber in bowl. Top with tuna. Drizzle with oil and lemon.

lunch_006.title: Veggie Burger Bowl
lunch_006.instructions: Cook quinoa. Grill veggie burger. Roast vegetables. Assemble bowl with quinoa, burger (crumbled), vegetables. Drizzle with tahini.

dinner_003.title: Beef Stir-Fry
dinner_003.instructions: Cook rice. Stir-fry beef until browned. Add vegetables, cook until tender. Add soy sauce and sesame oil. Serve over rice.

dinner_004.title: Chickpea Curry
dinner_004.instructions: Cook rice. SautÃ curry spices. Add chickpeas and coconut milk. Simmer 15 minutes. Add spinach, cook until wilted. Serve over rice.

dinner_005.title: Grilled Shrimp Tacos
dinner_005.instructions: Season and grill shrimp 2-3 minutes per side. Warm tortillas. Fill with shrimp, slaw, avocado. Squeeze lime and add cilantro.

dinner_006.title: Pasta Primavera
dinner_006.instructions: Cook pasta. SautÃ garlic and vegetables in olive oil. Toss with pasta. Top with parmesan.

snack_003.title: Hummus with Veggies
snack_003.instructions: Cut vegetables into sticks. Serve with hummus for dipping.

snack_005.title: Trail Mix
snack_005.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Portion into small container.

snack_006.title: Rice Cakes with Cottage Cheese
snack_006.instructions: Spread cottage cheese on rice cakes. Top with strawberries and drizzle with honey.
